java/liquibase/exception/StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException.java

00001 package liquibase.exception;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00005 
00006 public class StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException extends JDBCException {
00007     private String reason;
00008 
00009     public StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException(SqlStatement statement, Database database) {
00010         super(statement.getClass().getName()+" is not supported on "+database.getProductName());
00011     }
00012 
00013     public StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException(String reason, SqlStatement statement, Database database) {
00014         super(statement.getClass().getName()+" is not supported on "+database.getProductName()+": "+reason);
00015         this.reason = reason;
00016     }
00017 
00018     public String getReason() {
00019         return reason;
00020     }
00021 }
